mapper.select: select member_num,id, name, email, phone, addr, addr_detail, zipcode from member where id =#{id} and pass=#{pass} and member_flag='Y'
mapper.insert: insert into member(MEMBER_NUM, ID, PASS, NAME, EMAIL, PHONE, ZIPCODE, ADDR, ADDR_DETAIL, IP) values(seq_mem_num.nextval, #{ id }, #{ pass }, #{ name }, #{ email },#{ phone }, #{ zipcode }, #{ addr }, #{ addr_detail }, #{ ip } )
